originalText.text: Have been a patient for years and could not be happier. Everything is clearly explained and my time is never wasted with unnecessary tests. Great physician and great guy.

text.text: Have been a patient for years and could not be happier. Everything is clearly explained and my time is never wasted with unnecessary tests. Great physician and great guy.

originalText.text: Worst cardiologist in my experience, insulting, lacking in ability to compassionately listen to patient concerns, speak clearly and unwilling to adjust meds with problematic side effects. When I  asked  about the expected impact on lifespan if taking a specific drug, he answered, “you could die tomorrow if your took a gun and shot yourself in the head.”  Appalling, particularly given history of depression     In response  to other rx questions, he replied callously , “there appears to be a disconnect between what you think medicine can do and what it can actually do. “.  Unbelievable. And  There’s much more.

originalText.text: Listens to my concerns and works well with my regular doctor and my specialists. I have multiple ongoing issues and poor family history. I feel safe under his care.

originalText.text: The absolute best doctor I have had the opportunity to meet. He is honest and not a drug pusher. Highly Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Very attentive, knowledgeable, and responsive doctor. Highly recommend.
